title: Debt Relief Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Debt Relief Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Debt Relief Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 136
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِي بِحَلاَلِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ، وَأَغْنِنِي بِفَضْلِكِ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ)).
items.transliteration: Allahummak-finee bihalalika AAan haramik, wa-aghninee bifadlika AAamman siwak.
items.translation: O Allah, make what is lawful enough for me, as opposed to what is unlawful, and spare me by Your grace, of need of others.

items.title: Dua 137
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ)).
items.transliteration: Allahumma innee aAAoothu bika minal-hammi walhuzn, walAAajzi walkasal, walbukhl, waljubn, wadalAAid-dayni waghalabatir-rijal
items.translation: O Allah, I take refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow, weakness and laziness, miserliness and cowardice, the burden of debts and from being over powered by men.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء قضاء الدين
